ModMetaData.name: [KV] Change Dresser - 1.0
ModMetaData.author: Kiame Vivacity
ModMetaData.description:
Adds a dresser and mirror which allow a pawn to change their apparal colors, hair color, skin color, hair style, body type, head type, and gender.
Thank you translators! Vaniat - Chinese Simplified and Traditional Proxyer - Japanese Ɲơɴɑɱɛ - German Gidreess - Russian Boundir - French Xion - Spanish
